item.title: RFK Jr. faces Senate about CDC chaos. And, Harvard funding freeze ruled illegal
item.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. will testify in the Senate today after last week's shakeup at the CDC. And, a federal judge says the Trump administration illegally froze billions of Harvard's funds.

item.title: Sell it, donate it — recycle it? A beloved old minivan faces a fork in the road
